headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) After Its Strong Run?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Bank of New York Mellon Corporation shares still offer value after their strong run, this article will walk through what the numbers are actually saying about the price you see on screen. BNY shares last closed at US$119.92, with returns of 2.0% over 7 days, 3.3% over 30 days, 2.5% year to date, 42.5% over 1 year and 159.5% over 3 years, while the 5 year return sits at 228.5%. Recent market interest in BNY has been shaped by ongoing coverage of large US...
